name: Expense-manager
tagline: Expense Manager app which is used to manage financial transactions (accounts, payments & subjects).
body:
### Welcome to the Expense-Manager page!
The application manages individual accounts and payments, also records subjects with whom there are ongoing payment transactions. Based on the data obtained allows generation of reports for a certain period, for individual accounts, for each entity etc. The purpose is to increase the visibility and facilitate the work with a large number of payment transactions on different accounts.


### Entities
![Entities](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rudky4/Expense-Manager/master/wiki/img/entities.png)

### Main Methods
*** addPayment()**
*** removePayment()**
*** getAccountBalance()**
*** getAllPayments()**
*** getAllPaymentsBySubject()**
*** createXML()**
*** createReport(xml)**

### Authors and Contributors
* documentation - @charlliz @rudky4
* unitTests - @levejhak @charlliz
* database & backend - @zvolas8 @levejhak
* XML Schema & output - @charlliz @rudky4
* XSLT transformation - @levejhak @zvolas8
* Project Management & Presentation - @rudky4
* GUI (app for Win) - @levejhak @zvolas8 @rudky4 @charlliz

### Support or Contact
For more information contact @rudky4

***

This project has been develeped for course PB138 Modern Markup Languages.
